body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Kenneth Gray and I'm from Acoustic Sounds. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Kenneth, my name is Lauren Reed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Lauren. Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is lauren.reed@example.com and my phone number is five five five six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information. How can I assist you today with our Music Store services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in purchasing a vinyl record player. Could you recommend a model for me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, we have a great selection of record players. What is your budget range for the purchase?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to spend around two zero zero to three zero zero dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for letting me know. Are there any specific features you are looking for in the record player?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I would like a built-in preamp and Bluetooth connectivity.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have a few models in mind that match your criteria. I will send you the options via email. Thank you for choosing Acoustic Sounds, Lauren. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Kenneth! I appreciate your assistance. Have a great day too.
